params.amountToBorrow: Amount of tokens requesting to borrow
params.borrower: Address of the borrower requesting funds

returns.isBorrowApproved: Whether the borrow request is approved or not*

params.maessageHash: hash of the message passed to the account

returns.isBurnApproved: whether the burn call is approved or not*

params.amountToUncommit: Amount of tokens requesting to uncommit
params.trancheId: Id of the tranche to uncommit from

returns.isUncommitApproved: Whether the uncommit request is approved or not*

params.amountToDeposit: Amount of tokens requesting to supply
params.trancheId: Id of the tranche to supply into

returns.isDepositApproved: Whether the deposit request is approved or not*

params.amountToCommit: Amount of tokens requesting to commit
params.trancheId: Id of the tranche to commit into

returns.isCommitApproved: Whether the commit request is approved or not*

params.capitalizedCommitmentFees: Amount of tokens to repay as capitalizedCommitmentFees
params.capitalizedInterests: Amount of tokens to repay as capitalizedInterests
params.defaultInterestsFromCFsAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as defaultInterestsFromCFsAmount
params.defaultInterestsFromInterestsAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as defaultInterestsFromInterestsAmount
params.defaultedCommitmentFeesAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as defaultedCommitmentFeesAmount
params.defaultedInterestsAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as defaultedInterestsAmount
params.defaultedPrincipalAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as defaultedPrincipalAmount
params.nonDefaultedCommitmentFeesAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as nonDefaultedCommitmentFeesAmount
params.nonDefaultedInterestsAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as nonDefaultedInterestsAmount
params.nonDefaultedPrincipalAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as nonDefaultedPrincipalAmount
params.protocolFeesAmount: Amount of tokens to repay as protocol fees
params.trancheId: Id of the tranche to supply into

returns.isRepaymentApproved: Whether the repayment request is approved or not*

params.commitmentFeesAmount: CFs amount of tokens requesting to withdraaw
params.interestsAmount: interests amount of tokens requesting to withdraaw
params.principalAmount: principal amount of tokens requesting to withdraaw
params.trancheId: Id of the tranche to uncommit from

returns.isWithdrawApproved: Whether the withdraw request is approved or not*

params.borrowerToUpdate: Address of the borrower to update*
address of the account to update its permissions*
params.trancheId: tranche id to update permissions from
params.trancheParams: tranche params to update permissions from

params.borrowerToUpdate: Address of the borrower to update*
params.newBorrowingBase: New borrowing base figure to persist in state

params.lenderToUpdate: address of the lender to update its permissions*
params.trancheId: tranche id to update permissions from
params.trancheParams: tranche params to update permissions from

params.borrowerToUpdate: Account to update the permissions to
params.newMaxAmount: Maximum amount of tokens approved for the address*

acceptAdminRole().notice: External function for the proposed admin to accept its role*

adminAddress().notice: External view returning the current admin address

borrowerPermissions(address).notice: External view returning the current borrower permissions

canBorrow(uint128,uint128,address).notice: View function checking whether a specific borrower is authorized to borrow a requested amount from the passed tranches

canBurn(address,bytes32,bytes).notice: External view returning whether a token burn can occur or not
